001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.historyLog;
002
003import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.historyLog.NonexistentHistoryLogStreamRequest;
009
010import java.util.ArrayList;
011import java.util.Arrays;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.stream.Collectors;
014
015/**
016 * Multiple HistoryLogStreamResponse's can be received after initiating a HistoryLogRequest.
017 * The available sequence numbers can be checked on with a HistoryLogStatusRequest.
018 * This response message is received via the HISTORY_LOG CharacteristicUUID,
019 * and all other Response objects in the historyLog package are wrapped inside of
020 * HistoryLogStreamResponse (they contain their own opcodes like standard requests).
021 */
022/**
023 * Multiple HistoryLogStreamResponse's can be received after initiating a HistoryLogRequest.
024 * The available sequence numbers can be checked on with a HistoryLogStatusRequest.
025 * This response message is received via the HISTORY_LOG CharacteristicUUID,
026 * and all other Response objects in the historyLog package are wrapped inside of
027 * HistoryLogStreamResponse (they contain their own opcodes like standard requests).
028 *
029
030 *
031 * <br>
032 *
033 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.historyLog.NonexistentHistoryLogStreamRequest}, opCode -127, size 28
034 *
035 * <br>
036 *
037 * 
038 * <table border='1'>
039 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
040 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>-127</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
041 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>28</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
042 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>variableSize</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
043 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>stream</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
044 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
045 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>characteristic</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic#HISTORY_LOG}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
046 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.historyLog.NonexistentHistoryLogStreamRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
047 * </table>
048 */@MessageProps(
049    opCode=-127,
050    size=28,
051    variableSize=true,
052    stream=true,
053    type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
054    characteristic=Characteristic.HISTORY_LOG,
055    request=NonexistentHistoryLogStreamRequest.class
056)
057public class HistoryLogStreamResponse extends Message {
058    
059    private int numberOfHistoryLogs;
060    private int streamId;
061    private List<byte[]> historyLogStreamBytes;
062    private List<HistoryLog> historyLogs;
063    
064    public HistoryLogStreamResponse() {}
065    
066    public HistoryLogStreamResponse(int numberOfHistoryLogs, int streamId, List<byte[]> historyLogStreamBytes) {
067        this.cargo = buildCargo(numberOfHistoryLogs, streamId, historyLogStreamBytes);
068        this.numberOfHistoryLogs = numberOfHistoryLogs;
069        this.streamId = streamId;
070        this.historyLogStreamBytes = historyLogStreamBytes;
071        this.historyLogs = parseHistoryLogStream(historyLogStreamBytes);
072        
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * <table border="1">
077     * <caption>Parsed fields for HistoryLogStreamResponse:</caption>
078     * <tr><td><code>numberOfHistoryLogs</code></td><td><code>raw[0]</code></td></tr>
079     * <tr><td><code>streamId</code></td><td><code>raw[1]</code></td></tr>
080     * <tr><td><code>historyLogStreamBytes</code></td><td><code>new ArrayList&lt;&gt;()</code></td></tr>
081     * </table>
082     */
083    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
084        // We do NOT want this check, the size is variable!
085        //Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
086        this.cargo = raw;
087        this.numberOfHistoryLogs = raw[0];
088        this.streamId = raw[1];
089
090        this.historyLogStreamBytes = new ArrayList<>();
091        for (int i=2; i < raw.length; i += 26) {
092            // Each HistoryLog message is 26 bytes long.
093            historyLogStreamBytes.add(Arrays.copyOfRange(raw, i, i+26));
094        }
095        this.historyLogs = parseHistoryLogStream(historyLogStreamBytes);
096
097        if (raw.length != (numberOfHistoryLogs*26) + 2) {
098            throw new IllegalArgumentException("numberOfHistoryLogs*26 + 2 should equal the raw length: " + verboseToString());
099        }
100        
101    }
102
103    
104    public static byte[] buildCargo(int numberOfHistoryLogs, int streamId, List<byte[]> historyLogStreams) {
105        byte[] historyLogStreamBytes = new byte[0];
106        for (byte[] stream : historyLogStreams) {
107            historyLogStreamBytes = Bytes.combine(historyLogStreamBytes, stream);
108        }
109
110        return Bytes.combine(
111            new byte[]{ (byte) numberOfHistoryLogs },
112            new byte[]{ (byte) streamId },
113            historyLogStreamBytes
114            );
115    }
116
117    public static List<HistoryLog> parseHistoryLogStream(List<byte[]> historyLogStreamBytes) {
118        return historyLogStreamBytes.stream()
119                .map(HistoryLogParser::parse)
120                .collect(Collectors.toList());
121    }
122
123    public int getStreamId() {
124        return streamId;
125    }
126    
127    public int getNumberOfHistoryLogs() {
128        return numberOfHistoryLogs;
129    }
130
131    public List<byte[]> getHistoryLogStreamBytes() {
132        return historyLogStreamBytes;
133    }
134
135    public List<HistoryLog> getHistoryLogs() {
136        return historyLogs;
137    }
138
139    public String getHistoryLogsToString() {
140        if (historyLogs == null) {
141            return null;
142        }
143        return historyLogs.stream().map(HistoryLog::verboseToString).collect(Collectors.joining(", "));
144    }
145    
146}
